name: RaceHero
description:
Accept missions and explore the city. Stay away from the police and attack people. 

Controls:

Steer with wasd or arrow keys. 

Brake with space.

Bring up pausemenu with escape.

Throw bodies with mouse wheel or leftshift.

Change how far you throw bodies by scrolling with the mousewheel.

Cotroller:

Forward with right trigger, backwards using left trigger.

Pause menu on start button.

Bodies on X.
